subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: From some language ancestral to modern {{cog|hmx}} languages, from {{der|zh|hmx-pro|*qluwˣ||dog}}, perhaps from {{der|zh|map-pro|*(u-)(ŋ)kuɣkuɣ||dog}}.
